name: Elf, Shadow Fey Executioner
description: A medium-sized humanoid with a fearsome presence, wielding necrotic-infused weapons. This executioner commands severed heads and utilizes shadows for movement, embodying a unique and sinister aspect of fey magic.
memorable: Masters the art of executing designated targets with necrotic weapon attacks and the ability to animate severed heads, causing vulnerability to those it hunts.
goals: Typically hunts specific targets assigned by shadow fey nobility. Acts as a deadly enforcer in the fey realms.
relations: Often serves shadow fey nobility and may be associated with other fey creatures.
environment: Usually found in dark or shadowy areas, often in service to powerful fey beings.
strengths: Robust hit points and condition immunities to being charmed and frightened; possesses powerful necrotic weapon attacks.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, suffering disadvantage on attacks and perception in bright light.
attacks: Utilizes a terrifying multiattack strategy with necrotic weapons and animated severed heads that inflict additional vulnerability.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Weapons ability enhances its attacks with additional necrotic damage based on the essence of slain foes.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 10 feet and is quite perceptive, with a passive perception score of 15 in darkness.
skills: Notable proficiency in Perception, making it more aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can animate severed heads to attack foes, dealing ongoing damage.
Advantage on saves against being charmed due to its Fey Ancestry.
Can vanish into shadows, enhancing its stealth and tactical options.
Commands heads that inflict vulnerability to necrotic damage.
Has a strong Strength score, allowing it to excel in physical encounters.
test_queries: lethal fey creature that commands severed heads
shadow traveler that hunts targets for nobility
necrotic infused attacker with advantage against charm
